data.title: William Allen Obituary & Funeral
data.meta_description: Passed away at his home on July 5, 2012. Age 45 years. He was born on June 25, 1967, the son of W. Fred Allen Jr. and the late Mary Kay (Hynous) Allen. He graduated from Hackett High
data.text: Passed away at his home on July 5, 2012. Age 45 years. He was born on June 25, 1967, the son of W. Fred Allen Jr. and the late Mary Kay (Hynous) Allen. He graduated from Hackett High School, where he played on the football team. He attended Albion College and Western Michigan University. Bill worked for Bronson Hospital for 18 years. He attended both St. Augustine Cathedral and First United Methodist Church. He was a former proud member of the Kalamazoo Rugby Team. Surviving are his father, W. Fred (Lana) Allen, Jr. of Kalamazoo; four brothers, Jeff (Jane Hamill) Allen of Chicago, Steve VandenBussche of Kalamazoo, Jeff VandenBussche of Chicago, and Mark (Nancy) Vanden Bussche of Minneapolis; five nieces and nephews, Charlie, George, Marleigh, Avery and Lily; many aunts, uncles and cousins throughout the country; and numerous friends and fellow co-workers. A memorial service will take place at 11 AM on Saturday, July 14, 2012 at First United Methodist Church, 212 S. Park St. Rev. Douglas Vernon will officiate. Memorials may be made to Hackett Catholic Central High School Athletic Department. Arrangements by Langeland Family Funeral Homes, Memorial Chapel, 622 S. Burdick St.,
